qlmanage(1) General Commands Manual qlmanage(1)

NAME

qlmanage — Quick Look Server debug and management tool

SYNOPSIS

qlmanage -r


qlmanage -m [name ...]


qlmanage -t [-x] [-i] [-s size] [-f factor] [-c contentTypeUTI [-g generator]] [file ...]


qlmanage -p [-x] [-c contentTypeUTI [-g generator]] [file ...]


qlmanage -h

DESCRIPTION

qlmanage allows you to test your Quick Look generators and manage Quick Look Server.

The following usages are available:

1.
qlmanage -r resets Quick Look Server and all Quick Look client's generator cache.
2.
qlmanage -m gets all sort of information on Quick Look server including the list of detected generators.
3.
qlmanage -t displays the Quick Look generated thumbnails (if available) for the specified files.
4.
qlmanage -p displays the Quick Look generated previews for the specified files.
5.
qlmanage -h displays extensive help.
